title: Ragie Original fonts
content:
Hi friend

Please help Id these fonts used in this logo

Thanks in advance

Miguel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ragie_original_4402.jpg)
author: hernando

comments.content: ‘Gilbert, Arizona’ and ‘riginals’ is Brush Script. ‘agie’ is as well, with added stroke.

yes you are right thanks  
what about the R and the O?
i'm ashamed to be an Arizonan :^(

I suspect a designer might not have done this.

Nick Cooke
Nick, I'm insulted! My cousins' boyfriends' sister did it on her Pentium 286. Doesn't that make her a designer?

My friend Amanda did it with a photocopier and a few old sheets of Letraset, and she's a designer ;^)

Maybe uhm. . .maybe err, maybe it's some kind of, anti-design piece put together by a designer looking for ways to irritate designers ;^)

Oh I really don't know.

j a m e s
